name: gener8tor
overview:
gener8tor invests its capital, expertise and network in capable, first-stage and second-stage entrepreneurs with innovative business models. gener8tor works with the startups in its portfolio to create successful, scalable companies.

gener8tor is backed in this effort by a successful team of entrepreneurs and business people with over 150 years of combined experience in creating wealth, companies and jobs. gener8tor’s goal is to be recognized by entrepreneurs and investors as the best choice for creating, incubating and accelerating a startup company.We will accomplish this by formalizing our services and continuously evaluating the effectiveness of our methods. Making money and creating jobs are byproducts of our combined efforts.

And we’ll have some fun along the way.
